00014 //---------------------------------------------------------
00015 //   ToolButton
00016 //    same as a QToolButton with toggle enabled
00017 //    plus:
00018 //      - has an id which is emitted in toggled signal
00019 //---------------------------------------------------------
00020 
00021 class ToolButton : public QToolButton {
00022       Q_OBJECT
00023       int id;
00024 
00025    private slots:
00026       void clicked() { emit cclicked(id); }
00027 
00028    signals:
00029       void cclicked(int id);
00030 
00031    public:
00032       ToolButton(int id, const QString& tip, const QPixmap& pm,
00033          QWidget* parent);
00034       ToolButton(int id, const QString& tip, const QString& txt,
00035          QWidget* parent);
00036       };
